author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: Re: Monkey Punch@SDCC report.
body:
> I really wanted to go, but a friend told me Japanese
> guests are random, and 
> I didn't want to pay for the event, only to find out
> that he might not show 
> up. So did any other Lupin otaku take the plunge?

Yeah a fellow named Dale Engelhard, the one you call
"the Lupin CosPlay God"....or something like that....
Here is his story:
----
He is very busy working on three non-Lupin related
films. They are "Musashi," feudal era period anime
with sci-fi mix story; "Scheherazade," still working
on an adaptation of Arabian nights; and a bold idea to
remake and animate the Kurosawa classic, "The Seven
Samurai." He is in league with ACC studio, and is
attempting to make some important connections here in
the States. He does, by the way, look very healthy, he
is still smoking though.... I videotaped most of the
panel for posterity, and I got him to draw me another
Fujiko.... Other highlights included meeting Boba Fett
actor J.Bulloch, and artist, Olivia, who was a
favorite and as much an honor as I could imagine. 
----

BTW, Daniel, now that I mentioned it, I'll be sure to
comment on you calling him "The God of Lupin CosPlay."
I'm sure he'd appreciate it. ^_^
